Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, so don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
